metadata.label: While
metadata.description: Loop over a block of code.

metadata.label: get
metadata.description: Retrieve a representation of a specified resource from an HTTP endpoint.

metadata.label: Target Type
metadata.description:
Expected return type (to be used for automatic data binding).
Supported types:
- Built-in subtypes of `anydata` (`string`, `byte[]`, `json|xml`, etc.)
- Custom types (e.g., `User`, `Student?`, `Person[]`, etc.)
- Full HTTP response with headers and status (`http:Response`)
- Stream of Server-Sent Events (`stream<http:SseEvent, error?>`)

metadata.label: If
metadata.description: Add conditional branch to the integration flow.

metadata.label: Update Variable
metadata.description: Update the value of an existing variable

codedata.sourceCode: msg = "Response received from food service: " + response.toString();

metadata.label: Update Variable
metadata.description: Update the value of an existing variable

codedata.sourceCode: msg = "Error occurred while invoking food service: " + response.message();

expression.value: "Error occurred while invoking food service: " + response.message()

metadata.label: Continue
metadata.description: Skip the current iteration and continue with the next one

metadata.label: HTTP
metadata.description: The HTTP client provides functionality to connect to remote HTTP services and perform requests using standard HTTP methods like GET, POST, PUT, DELETE, etc.

metadata.label: HTTP Version
metadata.description: HTTP protocol version supported by the client

metadata.label: Timeout
metadata.description: Maximum time(in seconds) to wait for a response before the request times out

metadata.label: Forwarded
metadata.description: The choice of setting `Forwarded`/`X-Forwarded-For` header, when acting as a proxy

metadata.label: Follow Redirects
metadata.description: HTTP redirect handling configurations (with 3xx status codes)

metadata.label: Pool Config
metadata.description: Configurations associated with the request connection pool

metadata.label: Auth
metadata.description: Client authentication options (Basic, Bearer token, OAuth, etc.)

metadata.label: Circuit Breaker
metadata.description: Circuit breaker configurations to prevent cascading failures

metadata.label: Retry Config
metadata.description: Automatic retry settings for failed requests

metadata.label: Cookie Config
metadata.description: Cookie handling settings for session management

metadata.label: Response Limits
metadata.description: Limits for response size and headers (to prevent memory issues)

metadata.label: Proxy
metadata.description: Proxy server settings if requests need to go through a proxy

metadata.label: Validation
metadata.description: Enable automatic payload validation for request/response data against constraints

metadata.label: Socket Config
metadata.description: Low-level socket settings (timeouts, buffer sizes, etc.)

metadata.label: Lax Data Binding
metadata.description:
Enable relaxed data binding on the client side.
When enabled:
- `null` values in JSON are allowed to be mapped to optional fields
- missing fields in JSON are allowed to be mapped as `null` values

metadata.label: Secure Socket
metadata.description: SSL/TLS security settings for HTTPS connections

metadata.label: Connection Scope
metadata.description: Scope of the connection, Global or Local
